summary: An Ordinance temporarily relieving the Seattle and Rainier Valley Railway Company from the obligation of establishing or maintaining service on Main Street from Fourth Avenue South to Fifth Avenue South, on Fifth Avenue South from Main Street to Dearborn Street; on Stewart Street from Fourth Avenue to Fifth Avenue; on Fifth Avenue from Stewart Street to Blanchard Street; on Blanchard Street from Fifth Avenue to Third Avenue, and on Third Avenue from Blanchard Street to Stewart Street, and authorizing the removal of tracks already laid on said route.
